subtitle: Cinnamon and honey is a marriage made in heaven with thick and creamy Greek yogurt. Here the combination tops fresh ripe peaches with brandy and redcurrants.

method.text: Arrange peaches cut side up in a large ovenproof dish. Dot with the butter and drizzle with the brandy and honey. Grill under a medium heat for 5 min until peaches start to soften. The brandy may flame a little under the heat of the grill, but it is nothing to worry about.
Top each peach with a spoonful of Greek yogurt and a stem of redcurrants. Mix cinnamon into sugar then sprinkle over.
Return peaches to grill for 1-2 min more until the yogurt just sets. Cool for a few minutes. Decorate with the mint. Serve while still warm.

title: Cinnamon grilled peaches with honeyed Greek yogurt
